articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and laid floral baskets before them on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They visited the statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen standing before them was a floral basket sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before them were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises, factories and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The visitors paid respects at the statues.
					
					 Service personnel and people also paid floral tribute to the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in the city.
					
					 The service personnel, working people, school youth and children across the country also visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting them in their residential areas to pay respects to them.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at Party Central Committee Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at Party Central Committee Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On the holiday service personnel and people from all walks of life including school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and different places and their smiling portraits to pay tribute to them.
					
					 Performances were given by the central art organizations at theatres in Pyongyang. 
					
					 A concert was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre, a musical dance and poem "'Arirang' Story" at the Ponghwa Art Theatre, a performance "Eternal Echo" by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and a drama "Red Snow Falls" by the National Theatrical Troupe at the National Theatre.
					
					 Colorful pieces were put on the stages of the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the Magic Theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe and artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe gave a performance in front of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Artistes of the provincial art troupes gave performances at all provincial seats.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in various parts of the DPRK on Monday, the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 When the song "Glory to General" resounded forth at the dancing party grounds in various places of Pyongyang including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the participants staged cheerful dances, recollecting the party-building exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They danced to the melodies of songs "The General Star beyond the Clouds" and "Our General Is the Best", extending glory to Kim Jong Il who trained a huge unit of successors to the revolution and built a youth power, the first of its kind in the world.
					
					 "We Are Mallima Riders" and "Song of Youth" which reflect the revolutionary mettle of the youth vanguard revved up the festive atmosphere.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also held at provincial seats across the country.

articles.title: Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for Party Building
articles.content:
Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK editorially praise the exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il for party building on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964) was the great event which opened a radical turn in developing the WPK and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution, papers say.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The party-building history of Kim Jong Il is associated with proud course of victory and glory upholding the red flag of the WPK.
					
					 From the beginning of the work of leading the WPK Kim Jong Il propounded the unique idea on the party-building centered on the leader and consistently implemented it.
					
					 He firmly laid the party's organizational and ideological foundation under the banner of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism and saw to it that great changes were brought about in the party work and activities on the basis of idea, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 It was the steadfast will of Kim Jong Il to carry forward the socialist cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung down through generations.
					
					 He clearly indicated scientific accuracy and truth of socialism with perfect logic to provide the guidelines for our party to victoriously advance the socialist cause.
					
					 He formulated the revolution as love and trust in the people and thoroughly applied to the party-building and party activities.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership our party has given top priority to the interests of the people and held them absolute, regarding them as roots of life and source of inexhaustible strength. During the days our people have absolutely trusted in and followed the party as the beacon of their destiny and mother.
					
					 Minju Joson says Kim Jong Il was the prominent leader who prioritized efforts to strengthening the party during the whole period of leadership of the revolution and steadily increased the leadership role of the party and victoriously led the socialist cause.

articles.title: Ideological Work Guarantees Victorious Advance of Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ideological Work Guarantees Victorious Advance of Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 22nd anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism". 
					 The past twenty odd years since the publication of the work were the stirring period when Korean-style socialism has won victories only despite arduous difficulties by dint of the might of idea and ideological work, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The red flag of the revolution that preserved its color in the forest of Mt Paektu remained invariably fluttering as banner of socialism despite manifold ordeals and extreme moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces against the DPRK. This is owing to the Workers' Party of Korea which has given priority to the ideological work all the time.
					
					 The ideological work of our party was the mental pabulum which gave invincible confidence and optimism to all the people and service personnel and the source of strength which achieved the great victory and changes to go down in the national history.
					
					 The people bring about a great upsurge in the revolution and construction and socialism is dynamically advancing full of vigor to the tune of the ideological campaign. This is the immutable truth taught by the past sacred annals. 
					
					 The ideological work provides a sure guarantee for steadily strengthening the might of the single-minded unity and the powerful engine for creating ceaseless miracles and innovations in all the fields of building a socialist power. 
					
					 The ideological work enables us to firmly protect Korean-style socialism by smashing the reactionary ideological offensive of the imperialists.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Behavior
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Behavior
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Jong Se Gyun, speaker of the "National Assembly" of south Korea, recently visited Japan. When he meeting high-ranking politicians of Japan, he begged for "improvement of relations", saying south Korea-Japan relations are "important" and that he "is expecting forward-looking cooperative ties."
					 Earlier, Mun Hui Sang, assemblyman from the Minju Party of south Korea, went to Japan as "special envoy" and kowtowed to Japanese, expressing "hope for diplomacy rapprochement." These are acts betraying the mindset of the south Korean people demanding scrapping of the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Mendicant diplomacy of the south Korean authorities is humiliating behavior to cast a coquettish glance at Japan, sworn enemy of the Korean nation, and hurt the compatriots in collusion with it.
					
					 It is the cunning wicked intention of the Japanese reactionaries to realize the ambition for reinvasion of Korea with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 Such acts are nothing but treachery instigating the wild ambition of the Japs to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should draw a lesson from the miserable destiny of the Park Geun Hye group which ruined after resorting to the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts and confrontation with the compatriots. They should not make a mendicant diplomacy but make a bold decision of switching over for protecting the dignity and interests of the nation in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself with their own senses.

articles.title: Japan's Additional Sanctions upon DPRK Will Only Lead It to Self-Destruction: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Additional Sanctions upon DPRK Will Only Lead It to Self-Destruction: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are running helter-skelter, crying out for examining the feasibility of its additional sanctions upon the DPRK and plugging some countries into the campaign to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of blocking it from bolstering nuclear deterrent.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Monday says:
					
					 Japan has gone so foolish as to come under the shower of nuclear strike by the DPRK by adding to the crimes it committed against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear deterrent is an entirely just step to protect the country's sovereignty, peace and stability of the region from the ever-escalating military moves of the U.S. to stifle it.
					
					 Now that regional peace is ensured thanks to the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence, Japan has no reason to say this or that about nuclear and rocket development of the DPRK.
					
					 No matter how desperately Japan resorts to sanctions campaign to stifle the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. policy hostile to it, this will only result in a suicidal act of thrusting Japan into the strike range of the army of the DPRK.
					
					 If Japan seeks to stand in confrontation with the DPRK at any cost despite its repeated warnings, it has no option left.
					
					 If the DPRK-U.S. confrontation leads to an actual war, the archipelago of Japan which invited confrontation will never escape from heavy strikes by the DPRK as its primary target. 
					
					 Japan should seriously heed this warning.

articles.title: Kowtowing to Japan Is Act of Treachery: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Kowtowing to Japan Is Act of Treachery: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Recently, Jong Se Gyun, speaker of the "National Assembly" of south Korea, visited Japan and talked about "development of the forward-looking and ripen partnership" between south Korea and Japan.
					 How can they talk about "the forward-looking ties" leaving the thrice-cursed crimes of Japan, which has not settled its past crimes including the issue of the state-sponsored sexual slavery it committed against the Korean people?
					
					 Here is an example of the heinous remarks made by Liberal Democratic Party Secretary General of Japan Nikai when visiting south Korea as a special envoy of Prime Minister Abe on June 10. 
					
					 Going round various parts of south Korea, Nikai made rubbish insulting and threatening the south Korean people, who demanded renegotiations of the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. He called for "getting along well without quarrelling over tiny things," uttering that "those hatching plots have to be obliterated."
					
					 These are arrogant and impertinent remarks insulting south Korean people demanding the abrogation of the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery the Park Geun Hye group adopted with Japan, and intolerable mockery and open challenge to the entire Korean nation demanding the thorough settlement of the past crimes of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The above-said "agreement" is the traitorous one as it gave acquittal to the thrice-cursed crimes of sexual slavery of Japan in return for a petty amount of money.
					
					 That is why it is facing bitter condemnation and rebuff from all Koreans including the victims of the sexual slavery and south Korean people and the voices demanding its scrapping are increasing as the days go by.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the UN and other international organizations take issue with the illegality of the "agreement" and its inhumane nature, calling for its nullification.
					
					 Labeling just people as "those hatching plots" and "a handful group" and crying out for "obliterating them is reckless remarks revealing the brutality, crafty nature and ferocity of the Japs.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of south Korean people and all other Koreans to nullify the "agreement", one of evils left by the Park Geun Hye group, and force Japan to make a thousand-fold apology and reparation for the crimes.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities kowtowed to Japan, begging for "improvement of ties", far from faulting the arbitrary acts of the Japanese reactionaries. This is the unpardonable act of insulting the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and paying no heed to the blood-stained crimes of the past.
					
					 Such humiliating behavior will incite the ambition for reinvasion of the Japanese reactionaries trying to gloss over the heinous sexual slavery with a few amount of money without an apology and proper reparation and rushing headlong to overseas expansion.
					
					 This is tantamount to the act of the present south Korean authorities to follow in the footsteps of the Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 Now all Koreans more enthusiastically call for opening the way for independent reunification by pooling the efforts in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself. At this time trumpeting about "nuclear threats from the north" together with the Japs is an unpardonable act for confrontation with the compatriots.
					
					 It is high time for Koreans in the north and the south pooled their efforts to smash the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to turn Japan into a military giant and their wild ambition for reinvading the Korean peninsula. So, scheming the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north in collusion with Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, is as foolish as helping sharpen knives aiming at one's house.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to draw a lesson from the miserable destiny of the Park Geun Hye group which ruined after resorting to pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts and confrontation with the compatriots and bear in mind the spirit of national independence and the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Servile Attitude Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Servile Attitude Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The office of the spokesman for the Redemption and Prosperity Party of south Korea on June 15 made public a commentary ridiculing the south Korean police, according to the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 The commentary said that the police are still violently suppressing peaceful demonstrations held outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul, far from abolishing the evils.
					
					 It expressed the will to launch practical and organized punishment unless the police change its attitude.

articles.title: Legal Action against Police Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Legal Action against Police Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on June 15 released a commentary calling for a legal action against a policeman who mercilessly killed a peasant taking part in the struggle for vital rights.
					 The commentary said the policeman who used water cannon and those who killed people by abuse of power should be indicted for murder at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese internet magazine Nepal Today on June 10 posted the full text of "Let KCU Members Become True Sons and Daughters, Young Revolutionaries, of the Socialist Country", the speech made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 The magazine carried a portrait of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries from May 31 to June 6 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a lecture, reading session, round-table talks and film show in Angola, Guinea and Ethiopia.
					
					 "Mirae Scientists Street" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The vice-governor of Lunda-Norte Province, Angola, an official of a Guinean company and others highly praised Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into the Juche-type revolutionary party and turning the DPRK into an invincible military power and nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Observed in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Pskov City, Russia from June 8 to 15 on the occasions of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 1st anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the noble careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were their works, photos introducing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at an opening ceremony of the exhibition were personages of the administrations and assemblies of Pskov Region and City and different units, masses and the delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 Korean film "Prospering Pyongyang" was shown and a performance given by Russian artistes.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia acto provocativo de EE.UU. contra la soberania de RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia acto provocativo de EE.UU. contra la soberania de RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada con respecto a que en Nueva York de Estados Unidos fue ocurrido el caso de ser arrebatada la valija diplomatica de la RPDC, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 18 la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 16, la delegacion de la RPDC, que estaba en camino de regreso despues de haber participado en la sesion de Conferencia de Paises Partidarios al Convenio de Derechos de las Personas con Discapacitadas efectuada en Nueva Cork, fue arrebatada su valija diplomatica debido a los ilicitos actos provocativos del pais norteamericano en el Aeropuerto Internacional John F. Kennedy.
					
					En el aeropuerto, mas de 20 tipejos incluyendo las figuras pertenecientes al Departamento de Seguridad Nacional y los policias se lanzaron violentamente contra los diplomaticos coreanos con el certificado para valija diplomatica para arrebatar la valija diplomatica.
					
					Pese a la fuerte protesta de los diplomaticos coreanos los gangsteres norteamericanos lo quitaron por fuerza.
					
					Mas de 20 gangsteres esperaban a la delegacion coreana en la puerta de subida para avion y lanzaron contra ella, lo cual demuestra patentemente que este caso provocativo fue perpetrado segun el guion premeditado.
					
					Calificamos el caso de una imperdonable violacion a la soberania y un avieso acto provocativo contra la RPDC y lo condenamos fuertemente en nombre del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					El presente caso demuestra claramente a todo el mundo a que grado llego la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe meditar bien sobre las consecuencias que se emanaran de sus locuras.
					
					El presente caso perpetrado en Nueva Cork donde esta situada la sede de la ONU y se sirve del lugar de la asamblea general de esta organizacion internacional y otras reuniones deviene un ejemplo claro de que EE.UU. es el Estado gansteril.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe tomar en consideracion el hecho de que esa ciudad estadounidense seria conveniente o no como lugar de las reuniones internacionales.
					
					EE.UU debe explicar a la parte coreana sobre sus actos de violacion de soberania y el gobierno norteamericano debe pedir perdon oficial.
					
					Si no acepte nuestra demanda justa, EE.UU. se responsabilizara de todas las consecuencias posteriores.

articles.title: Delegado coreano demanda devolucion inmediata de las mujeres secuestradas
articles.content:
Delegado coreano demanda devolucion inmediata de las mujeres secuestradas
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- El delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo uso de la palabra el dia 15 en el 35o periodo de sesiones del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, efectuado en Ginebra.
					El delegado coreano recordo que bajo la politica del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de priorizar, respetar y amar al pueblo, se desarrolla hoy dia en la RPDC la lucha por frustrar las tentativas de sancion y presion de las fuerzas hostiles y ofrecer al pueblo los derechos independientes y los verdaderos derechos humanos, y prosiguio:
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC rechaza totalmente el intento de politizar el problema de DDHH, pero concede importancia al dialogo y cooperaciones verdaderos en la rama internacional de DDHH.
					
					El Consejo de DDHH de la ONU debe tomar las medidas correspondientes sin tolerar por mas tiempo los actos violadores de DDHH de EE.UU, maxima tundra de DDHH del mundo y caudillo de violacion de derechos humanos.
					
					Japon es el ejemplar Estado criminal de DDHH que no tiene calidad de presentarse en el escenario de derechos humanos.
					
					Son incontables los actos de violacion de DDHH cometidas por el Sur de Corea. En particular, en abril del ano pasado, las autoridades surcoreanas secuestraron y raptaron a las 12 ciudadanas de la RPDC y niegan hasta la fecha su devolucion, lo cual deviene un crimen de secuestro y una violacion de DDHH de pesima calana del siglo XXI.
					
					La delegacion coreana exige fuertemente a la oficina de alto comisionado de la ONU y al Consejo de DDHH de la ONU que sigan prestando atencion al caso y tomen las medidas correspondientes para la devolucion inmediata de las secuestradas.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica acto de sumision de autoridades surcoreanas a Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica acto de sumision de autoridades surcoreanas a Japon
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Durante su reciente viaje a Japon el presidente de la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea, Jong Se Gyun, mendigo a los politicos de alto rango del pais isleno la "mejora de las relaciones bilaterales" diciendo que son "importantes" las relaciones entre el Sur de Corea y Japon y "espera que se creen las relaciones de cooperacion con vistas al futuro".
					 Con anterioridad, Mun Hui Sang, "parlamentario" dependiente del Partido Minju que visito a Japon en calidad del "enviado especial", tambien se comporto servilmente mostrandoles el "deseo de la restauracion de las relaciones diplomaticas".
					
					  Esto deviene la traicion a la opinion publica del Sur de Corea que demanda la anulacion del "acuerdo" sobre el problema de esclavitud sexual para el ex ejercito japones, logrado en el periodo de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye.
					
					  Asi critica el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					  La diplomacia mendigante de las autoridades surcoreanas constituye la vil conducta tendente a adular a Japon, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana y perjudicar a la connacional, RPDC, en contubernio con este.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses tienen el intento astuto  de lograr su ambicion para reagredir a Corea bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					  Por tanto, el intento de cooperar con esta fuerza foranea deviene el acto vendepatria y traidor a la nacion igual que  instiga la ambicion agresiva de los nipones.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben sacar las lecciones del destino tragico de la horda de Park Geun-hye que se arruino al cabo de haber recurrido al acto proyanqui y projapones y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Igualmente, tienen que tomar la decision de cambiar la direccion hacia el camino de defender con la fuerza conjunta nacional la dignidad e intereses de la nacion, en vez de mendigar algo a los reaccionarios japoneses.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia la posicion humillante de Sur de Corea a Japon
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia la posicion humillante de Sur de Corea a Japon
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- En su reciente visita a Japon, el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea, Jong Se Gyun hablo del "desarrollo de las relaciones maduras de acompanantes con vistas al futuro" entre el Sur de Corea y Japon.
					?Seria posible hablar de las "relaciones con vistas al futuro", haciendo vista gorda de los inauditos crimenes de Japon que niega la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado como el problema de esclava sexual, delito estatal de pesima calana contra el pueblo coreano?
					
					Lo comprueban los disparates malsanos del secretario en jefe del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon, Nikai, quien visito el 10 de junio el Sur de Corea en calidad del enviado especial del premier japones Abe.
					
					En su recorrido por las localidades surcoreanas, Nikai insulto y chantajeo a los habitantes surcoreanos que demandan las renegociaciones del "acuerdo" sobre el problema de esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones, diciendo: "vamos a llevarnos bien sin pelear por cosas insignificantes" y "hay que eliminar a los que traman artimanas".
					
					Estas locuras arrogantes insultan a los habitantes surcoreanos que exigen cancelar el "acuerdo" del problema de esclavas sexuales de caracter humillante firmado con Japon por la banda de Park Geun-hye y a toda la nacion que quiere saldar cuenta de todos los crimenes del pasado cometidos por el imperialismo japones.
					
					Al decir sobre el "acuerdo" es un documento traidor y de vendepatria que la banda de Park exonero a Japon del crimen de esclavas sexuales a cambio de un punado de dinero.
					
					Por esta razon, las victimas de esclavas sexuales, los habitantes surcoreanos y todos los coreanos lo condenan y repudian unanimemente y las voces de su cancelacion se alzan cada dia mas.
					
					No es casual que la ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales cuestionen el caracter ilegal y de lesa humanidad del "acuerdo" e insistan en su invalidez.
					
					Sin embargo, Japon calumnia estas insistencias justas del interior y exterior como "camarilla de los que traman la artimana" y un "punado" e instiga su "exterminacion", exponiendo la barbaridad, astucia y crueldad propias de los islenos.
					
					Abolir totalmente el "acuerdo" sobre el problema de esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones, uno de los males dejados por la horda de Park Geun-hye, y recibir la disculpa e indemnizacion de Japon, son la unanime exigencia de toda la poblacion surcoreana y todos los coreanos.
					
					En lugar de cuestionar los actos arrogantes de los reaccionarios japoneses, las autoridades surcoreanas mendigaron a los reaccionarios islenos la "mejora de relaciones" obedeciendo a ellos, lo cual constituye un acto intolerable que insulta a las victimas de esclavas sexuales y encubre los crimenes ensangrentados cometidos en el pasado por los imperialitas japoneses.
					
					Tal postura humillante a Japon instigara solo la ambicion de reagresion de los reaccionarios japoneses que dan acicate a la expansion al ultramar tras liquidar con un poco de dinero sus crimenes de esclavas sexuales, en lugar de pedir disculpas y hacer indemnizacion por sus crimenes contra la nacion coreana.
					
					Esta posicion de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas es igual a repetir la trayectoria projaponesa de la horda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Ahora, se hace mas fuerte que nunca la aspiracion de todos los coreanos de abrir el camino de la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos. En este momento, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte (de Corea)" en contubernio con las fuerzas ajenas, lo cual constituye una imperdonable locura de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Es una tonteria la conspiracion con los enemigos jurados de la confrontacion fratricida en el momento en que ambas partes coreanas deben unir las fuerzas a fin de frustrar las tentativas japonesas destinadas a convertirse en la potencia militar y su ambicion de reagresion a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben sacar la leccion del destino tragico de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, dimitida al cabo de recurrir a los actos proyanqui y projapones y la confrontacion fratricida, y recobrar el espiritu de independencia nacional y el ideal: "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
